summary: This document is a declaration by Robin Green, an employee of Wells Fargo Bank, certifying the authenticity of attached business records related to case number 22319031. It outlines the types of records produced, including account statements and transaction details, while noting the inability to locate records for a specific entity, SLI Designs, LLC.

persons.name: Robin Green
persons.context: Robin Green declares the authenticity of business records from Wells Fargo Bank related to legal proceedings.

keyFacts: Robin Green is employed by Wells Fargo Bank in the Summons and Subpoenas Department.
The document certifies the authenticity of business records related to case number 22319031.
Wells Fargo was unable to locate records for SLI Designs, LLC.
The bank's standard record retention period is seven years.
The total number of copies delivered was 1,446.
